sen.j: タデ（蓼、英名water pepper、学名Persicaria hydropiper）は、タデ科の1年草。
sen.e: Tade (polygonum, called water pepper in English, scientific name:Persicaria hydropiper) is polygonaceous annual grass.
Tade (polygonum, called water pepper in English, scientific name: Persicaria hydropiper) is polygonaceous an annual grass.
sen.cmt: コロンの後にスペースannual→an
sen.e: Tade (polygonum, called water pepper in English, scientific name: Persicaria hydropiper) is polygonaceous an annual grass.

sen.j: 単にタデと言う場合は、ヤナギタデを指す。
sen.e: When you simply say tade, it indicates water pepper.
When you simply say tade, it indicates a water pepper.
When you simply say tade, it indicates a water pepper.

sen.j: 「蓼食う虫」の蓼もヤナギタデである。
sen.e: Tade of 'Tade ku mushi' (a part of proverb, 'Tade ku mushi mo suki zuki,' meaning 'Everyone has his own taste') also indicates water pepper.
Tade of 'Tade ku mushi' (a part of proverb, 'Tade ku mushi mo suki zuki,' meaning 'Everyone has his own taste') also indicates a water pepper.
Tade of 'Tade ku mushi' (a part of proverb, 'Tade ku mushi mo suki zuki,' meaning 'Everyone has his own taste') also indicates a water pepper.

sen.j: 特有の香りと辛味を持ち、香辛料として薬味や刺身のつまなどに用いられる。
sen.e: It has unique aroma and acrid taste, so it is used for spice and garnishing served with raw fish as condiment.
It has a unique aroma and an acrid taste, so it is used for spice and garnishing served with raw fish as condiment.
It has a unique aroma and an acrid taste, so it is used for spice and garnishing served with raw fish as condiment.

sen.j: 品種としては、柳タデ（本タデ）、紅タデ、青タデ、細葉タデなどがある。
sen.e: Its varieties are yanagi-tade (water pepper) (also called hon-tade), beni-tade (red polygonum), ao-tade (blue polygonum), and hosoba-tade (lobulet polygonum).
Its varieties are yanagi-tade (water pepperm, also called hon-tade), beni-tade (red polygonum), ao-tade (blue polygonum), and hosoba-tade (lobulet polygonum).
sen.cmt: 二つの括弧が続くところを一つの括弧にまとめました。
sen.e: Its varieties are yanagi-tade (water pepperm, also called hon-tade), beni-tade (red polygonum), ao-tade (blue polygonum), and hosoba-tade (lobulet polygonum).

sen.j: タデの葉をすりつぶして酢でのばしたものはタデ酢と呼ばれる。
sen.e: It is called tade-su (tade vinegar) made by grinding tade leaves and diluting them with vinegar.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It is called tade-su (tade vinegar) made by grinding tade leaves and diluting them with vinegar.
A product called tade-su (tade vinegar) is made by grinding tade leaves and diluting them with vinegar.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて適宜修正

sen.j: アユの塩焼きに添えられる。
sen.e: It is added to a grilled ayu (sweetfish) with salt as garnishing.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It is added to a broiled ayu (sweetfish) with salt as garnishing.
It is added to a broiled ayu (sweetfish) with salt as garnishing.

sen.j: 辛味成分はポリゴジアール。
sen.e: The pungent component is polygodial.
The pungent component is polygodial.
The pungent component is polygodial.
